---
title: "LORR"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```


```{r}
LORR<-read.csv("LORR MC MP.csv")
```

```{r}
LORR1<-LORR%>%
  mutate(Log_Length=log(Length))%>%
  mutate(Log_Weight=log(Weight))
```

```{r}
Linear<-lm(Log_Weight~Log_Length, data = LORR1)
print(Linear)
```

```{r}
summary(Linear)
```
```{r}
LORR1%>%
  ggplot(aes(x=Log_Length,y=Log_Weight))+
  geom_point()+
  geom_smooth(method = lm,formula = y ~ x,se=F)
```

```{r}
LORR1%>%
  ggplot(aes(x=Length,y=Temp_Ave,color=Date))+
  geom_point()+
  geom_smooth(se=F,method = lm)
```
```{r}
LORR1%>%
  ggplot(aes(x=Length,y=Temp_Ave))+
  geom_point()+
  geom_smooth(se=F,method = lm)
```
```{r}
LORR1%>%
  ggplot(aes(x=Weight,y=Temp_Ave,color=Date))+
  geom_point()+
  geom_smooth(se=F,method = lm)
```
